ygData.subject: Divine aura or divine barrier
ygData.msgSnippet: I just reached level 29 and tested divine barrier. I am a bit disappointed. I noticed that divine barrier lasts for around 22 secs while divine aura lasts for
ygData.messageBody:
I just reached level 29 and tested divine barrier. I am a bit disappointed.
I noticed that divine barrier lasts for around 22 secs while divine aura
lasts for some 20 secs. Divine barrier also restores some HPs, I was
standing and noticed around 50 hit points regenerated.

But 100 mana!?! That is a lot of mana in an emergency. Can the rest of you
clerics please give me advice. What do you prefer to use after level 29?

// JS
